xml.data:
Home » 17A11 Ekādasakanipātapāḷi » 1 Paṭhamapaṇṇāsaka » 1.4 Rāgapeyyāla
1.4.11--170
Paṭhamapaṇṇāsaka
Rāgapeyyāla
513--672.
228“Dosassa…pe…  mohassa…  kodhassa…  upanāhassa…  makkhassa…  paḷāsassa…  issāya…  macchariyassa…  māyāya…  sāṭheyyassa…  thambhassa…  sārambhassa…  mānassa…  atimānassa…  madassa…  pamādassa abhiññāya…pe…  pariññāya…  parikkhayāya…  pahānāya…  khayāya…  vayāya…  virāgāya…  nirodhāya…  cāgāya…  paṭinissaggāya ime ekādasa dhammā bhāvetabbā”ti.
229Idamavoca bhagavā. Attamanā te bhikkhū bhagavato bhāsitaṃ abhinandunti.
230Rāgapeyyālaṃ niṭṭhitaṃ.
231
Nava suttasahassāni,
bhiyyo pañcasatāni ca;
Sattapaññāsa suttantā,
aṅguttarasamāyutāti.
232Ekādasakanipātapāḷi niṭṭhitā.
233Aṅguttaranikāyo samatto.
<< 1.4.2--10 up
